EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Melissa, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the message below. Are you still interested in learning more about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you get a chance. Thank you, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, May 15, 2012 3:25 PM To: 'melissa@smartnetstrategies.com' Cc: Steve Arhancet (sarhancet@mbopartners.com) Subject: MBO Point of Contact Hi Melissa, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Steve Arhancet. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Steve has brought me up to speed on your background but if you would like to set up a time to chat you may go here. I look forward to workign with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
